channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- The installer of Microsoft OneDrive
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- The installer of Microsoft OneDrive

item.title: CVE-2018-0593|2024-08-05T03:28:11.255Z -- microsoft -- the%20installer%20of%20microsoft%20onedrive
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the installer of Microsoft OneDrive allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
